translated: Hello and welcome, if you want to learn more about AWS services, it's an immense pleasure for me to teach you everything I know.
My name is Rafael and I work at Amazon Web Services creating training like the one you're watching here.
We hope that you are enjoying this learning journey using the artificial intelligence services that the Amazon cloud offers.

Did you know that Amazon offers services to help you with computer vision, defect detection on assembly lines, recognition of data in text and spoken content, business metrics, the health sector, source code improvement, and even artificial intelligence in the industrial sector.
All of this to improve the experience of your customers.
